name: Authority Life Counter for Star Realms
name_original: Authority Life Counter for Star Realms
description:
Are you tired of counting authority points or cards when playing your favorite game Star Realms of White Wizard? I think it's time for a nice, clean and minimalistic companion app for Star Realms.

This little app is fully integrated in your Star Realms gameplay: Instead of managing your own damage, you deal it with a swipe against your opponent! And if you gain authority you do a swipe in the direction of your authority score.

Features:
- Becomes part of your game
- It is developed especially for Star Realms
- Use gestures to deal damage to your opponent or to heal yourself
- A color coding system shows you the state of both players in the the glimpse of an eye.
- Before starting a game tap on one players authority score to change the initial value...
- To define the first player you won't have to flip a coin: Just use the randomizer button instead!
- Furthermore sounds and little effects are integrated to support your favorite games scenery as well
- A User Interface with brilliant Retina Support
- Supports 14 Languages including German, French, Spanish, Italian, Dutch and Portuguese
